programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Tactical Village: The officers attend mandatory training exercises where all regional precincts compete. Captain Holt becomes addicted to a game on his phone.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Fancy Brudgom: Boyle asks Peralta to be his best man. Jeffords, Santiago and Gina start a new diet but struggle to stick to it. Holt helps Diaz to make a sincere apology.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpson Tide: Homer, Barney and Moe become trapped in a nuclear submarine in a combat situation. Then Homer accidentally ejects the captain (guest star Rod Steiger).

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Trouble with Trillions: Homer and Mr Burns go on the run to Cuba with a trillion-dollar note that Mr Burns was meant to deliver to post-war Europe.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Women in Shorts: The women of Springfield take centre stage, with some special Simpsonified movie parodies including Barbie and The Chronicles of Narnia.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rednecks and Broomsticks: Homer discovers that Cletus and his pals are making moonshine. Lisa gets to know three teenage Wiccans. Guest starring Neve Campbell.

programme.title: The World's Biggest Cruise Ship
programme.desc: At 20 decks high and almost a quarter of a mile long, Icon of the Seas is the world's biggest cruise ship. What does it take to entertain guests on this floating metropolis?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Bob Mortimer, Richard Ayoade, Jennifer Saunders, Stephen Graham and Hannah Walters join the Goggleboxers for Survivor, Planet Earth III, Teen First Dates and loads more top TV.

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: (2022) It's Predator, 1719 style. Amber Midthunder stars as a Comanche hunter who must save her tribe from an extraterrestrial threat in this action prequel. If it bleeds, you can kill it.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Sapphire hopes to find her ideal woman by stripping back the clothes. Kieron, who's been single for three years, chooses from six women in the Naked Attraction pods.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Bob Mortimer, Richard Ayoade, Jennifer Saunders, Stephen Graham and Hannah Walters join the Goggleboxers for Survivor, Planet Earth III, Teen First Dates and loads more top TV.

programme.title: The World's Biggest Cruise Ship
programme.desc: At 20 decks high and almost a quarter of a mile long, Icon of the Seas is the world's biggest cruise ship. What does it take to entertain guests on this floating metropolis?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Sapphire hopes to find her ideal woman by stripping back the clothes. Kieron, who's been single for three years, chooses from six women in the Naked Attraction pods.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Stop Arguing and Start Thanking: When Beverly invites Murray's unreliable brother Marvin to visit at Thanksgiving, she re-ignites their long-standing feud.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Shopping: Erica's new job at a department store is put in jeopardy when Beverly takes advantage of her daughter's employee discount far too frequently.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Adrenaline junkie Mark wants to fly high and take to the sky on his big day, but his straight-talking bride-to-be Lynsey wants more personal, no-nonsense nuptials.

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series - Is It Fake?: The teams replicate items from the 1950s Blake and Brickman Detective Agency's office. They'll be judged on difficulty, with bonus points available.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: The One on a Caravan Site: Lauren wants to feel unique at her wedding, but her groom plans their nuptials at the same caravan park that Lauren visits every year...

programme.title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the...
programme.desc: ...Curse of the Mummy: (2022) Animated family adventure. After Tad accidentally unleashes a curse - doh! - he and his friends must find the Emerald Tablet to save the world.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Davide: In Boston, Gordon Ramsay visits Davide, an Italian restaurant that's been run into the ground by brothers Frank and Anthony. Can they learn to trust each other again?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Cafe Tavolini: In Bridgeport, Connecticut, Gordon Ramsay visits Cafe Tavolini, a restaurant that's being neglected as the couple who run it teeter on the edge of divorce.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Zeke's: In New Orleans, Gordon Ramsay visits a restaurant famed for its Cajun food and loyal locals. But under new ownership, standards have slipped and the customers have left.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Blackberry's: Gordon visits New Jersey to save floundering soul food restaurant Blackberry's. Owner Shelley doesn't want to hear his advice, but then Gordon finds a dead mouse.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Homer They Fall: Homer becomes a boxer, thanks to his abnormally hard head. But is his skull strong enough for a fight against heavyweight champion Drederick Tatum?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kamp Krusty: Bart fakes his school report so that Homer will let him and Lisa go to Kamp Krusty. But the summer camp turns out to be a sweatshop and Bart leads an uprising...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge: Homer's boorishness inspires Marge to give the performance of a lifetime in a musical version of A Streetcar Named Desire.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa the Beauty Queen: Lisa wins second place in a beauty contest.

programme.title: Live Football: Third Place...
programme.desc: ...Play-Off - AFCON: The two losing semi-finalists face off in Casablanca. This fixture has gone all the way to penalties at each of the last two Africa Cups of Nations.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror III: Lisa, Grampa and Bart tell scary stories at their Halloween party. A Krusty doll comes alive. Mr Burns heads to Skull Island. Bart raises the dead.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Itchy and Scratchy: The Movie: While Homer and Marge are at parents' evening, Bart breaks the babysitter's teeth. So Homer vows never to let him see the Itchy and Scratchy film.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XX: Bart and Lisa seek revenge on their teachers. Krusty's latest snack turns Springfield's citizens into zombies. Moe's beer is tainted with Homer's blood.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Nada: Marge becomes famous when she poses for a racy charity calendar. Mr Burns promotes Carl to supervisor.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Pranks and Greens: Bart is determined to seek out the best prankster in Springfield Elementary's history to ask him all about his legendary practical jokes.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rednecks and Broomsticks: Homer discovers that Cletus and his pals are making moonshine. Lisa gets to know three teenage Wiccans. Guest starring Neve Campbell.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: From Mo Gilligan to Joanna Lumley, what do Britain's favourite famous faces think of The Greatest Auction, Our Planet, Countdown, M3GAN, and Siren: Survive the Island?

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox for Stand...
programme.desc: ...Up To Cancer: Celebrities and Gogglebox regulars check out Rivals, First Dates, Only Connect and much more in this special episode for Stand Up To Cancer.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: (2019) Caitlin Moran's coming-of-age comedy based on her own experiences of trying to make it as a music journo in London. Cool people are the worst. Strong language/sex/self-harm.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: (1971) Vanessa Redgrave stars in a dramatisation of the life of the 16th-century Scottish queen. Glenda Jackson co-stars as her cousin and rival, England's Queen Elizabeth I. Violence.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: (2001) Modern swashbuckling medieval action adventure starring Heath Ledger, Shannyn Sossamon and Paul Bettany. A lowly squire jousts his way to the top, with help from Geoffrey Chaucer.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: (2018) Action crime thriller sequel. Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, who's out for revenge after ruthless killers murder an agency contact who he also considered a friend.

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: (1999) David Lynch's fact-based drama with Richard Farnsworth. Alvin Straight drives hundreds of miles across the USA on a lawnmower to visit his dying brother - Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: Lynch/Oz
programme.desc: (2022) Alexandre O Philippe's unique yet edifying documentary on David Lynch pulls back the curtain to reveal how The Wizard of Oz and Judy Garland influenced the visionary auteur's films.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: (1951) Comedy adventure. Burt Lancaster stars as a Foreign Legion sergeant leading nine men on a dangerous mission to prevent a Berber attack on a North African desert fort.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Tobruk
programme.desc: (1967) World War II thriller. George Peppard, Rock Hudson and Nigel Green lead a daring Allied raid to destroy Nazi fuel dumps in North Africa.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections. Features Danny Boyle, Amy Schumer, Chiwetel Ejiofor and more.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: (2011) Romance meets sci-fi thriller. Matt Damon and Emily Blunt star as a politician and a dancer who begin to suspect that a shadowy group of men are interfering with their lives.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure starring Matt Damon and Willem Dafoe. In 11th-century China, Europeans seeking the secret of gunpowder are caught up in a war against alien monsters.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: (2019) Keanu Reeves returns for the third time as the supposedly retired hitman. Someone's put a contract on John Wick's head and only a mystic in Morocco can lift it.

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: (2020) Dark comedy with Olivia Cooke, Alec Baldwin and Colm Meaney. A young woman devises a series of elaborate heists and schemes to fund a new life.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Think Like a Dog
programme.desc: (2020) Cheeky comedy with Megan Fox. A young science prodigy (Gabriel Bateman) invents a piece of tech that lets him and his pet dog communicate with each other telepathically.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: (2001) Comedy. A Las Vegas casino-owner sets up a unique game for six punters: a race across America, hunting for $2m. Starring John Cleese, Rowan Atkinson and Whoopi Goldberg.

programme.title: Earth vs the Flying Saucers
programme.desc: (1956) Sci-fi thriller. Hugh Marlowe stars as a scientist who discovers Earth is threatened by a fleet of flying saucers bent on global conquest. With special effects by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: (2022) Family comedy with Michael Pea. A young lad discovers that his slacker dad is a superhero. And before he's got used to the idea, he must foil a villain's plot to bring his dad down.

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: (1999) Action thriller. Sean Connery is Robert 'Mac' MacDougal, one of the world's finest art thieves, while Catherine Zeta-Jones is the insurance company agent out to trap him.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: (1995) Al Pacino and Robert De Niro star in Michael Mann's crime thriller. A cop sets out to track down a career criminal and his gang of armed robbers. Violence/strong language.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.
